3d_maneuver_gear.tooltip.sword_blade_1: Shift right click to put this blade in the left holster
3d_maneuver_gear.tooltip.sword_blade_2: Regular right click to put this blade in the right holster
3d_maneuver_gear.tooltip.3d_maneuver_han: Used to operate the 3D Maneuver Gear
3d_maneuver_gear.tooltip.handle_left_nor: Use <LMB> to attack with left sword
3d_maneuver_gear.tooltip.handle_right_no: Use <RMB> to attack with right sword
3d_maneuver_gear.tooltip.handle_left_spr: Use <ctrl> + <LMB> to apply a blade to the left handle
3d_maneuver_gear.tooltip.handle_right_sp: Use <ctrl> + <RMB> to apply a blade to the right handle
3d_maneuver_gear.tooltip.fall_boots_1: These boots are equipped with shock dampers,
3d_maneuver_gear.tooltip.fall_boots_2: making it less painful to hit the ground at higher velocities
